sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaAmbulance, FaHospital, FaMobileAlt, FaRobot, FaVideo, FaStethoscope, FaChevronLeft, FaChevronRight, FaLanguage, FaClock, FaCheckCircle, FaLaptopMedical } from "react-icons/fa"; import './Home.css'; import chatbotGif from './assets/images/chatbot_gif.gif'; import { isAuthenticated } from './utils/authUtils'; function Home() { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const navigate = useNavigate(); const testimonials = [ { quote: "MediConnect helped my grandmother get specialist consultation without traveling 100km to the city. The doctor diagnosed her condition through video call and prescribed medication that was delivered to our doorstep.", author: "Rajesh Kumar", role: "Villager, Madhya Pradesh" }, { quote: "As an ASHA worker, this platform has made my job significantly easier. I can now connect villagers with doctors instantly and maintain digital health records for everyone.", author: "Lakshmi Devi", role: "ASHA Worker, Tamil Nadu" }, { quote: "The AI chatbot quickly identified my symptoms as potential dengue fever and arranged an immediate video consultation with a doctor. This prompt action probably saved my life.", author: "Amit Singh", role: "Farmer, Uttar Pradesh" }, { quote: "Being able to speak to the AI in my native language made all the difference. I could explain my symptoms properly and get the right medical advice.", author: "Sarita Patel", role: "Homemaker, Gujarat" } ]; useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setActiveIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex + 1) % testimonials.length); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [testimonials.length]); const goToTestimonial = (index) => { setActiveIndex(index); }; const navigateTestimonial = (direction) => { setActiveIndex((prevIndex) => { const newIndex = prevIndex + direction; if (newIndex < 0) return testimonials.length - 1; if (newIndex >= testimonials.length) return 0; return newIndex; }); }; // Updated function to handle chatbot button click with better redirection setup const handleChatbotClick = () => { // Always store the intended destination in sessionStorage as a fallback sessionStorage.setItem('intendedDestination', '/chatbot'); if (isAuthenticated()) { console.log("User already authenticated, navigating directly to chatbot"); navigate('/chatbot'); } else { console.log("User not authenticated, redirecting to login with return path"); // Clear any existing redirect state first sessionStorage.removeItem('redirectAfterLogin'); // Set a backup in sessionStorage sessionStorage.setItem('redirectAfterLogin', '/chatbot'); // Use navigate state navigate('/login', { state: { redirectAfterLogin: '/chatbot' } }); } }; return (
Healthcare Innovation

CONNECTING RURAL INDIA TO MODERN HEALTHCARE

MediConnect bridges the healthcare gap in rural India through innovative technology. We reach the unreached with telemedicine solutions, multilingual support, and a network of dedicated healthcare professionals.

200+ Villages Connected
24/7 Service Availability
5000+ Patients Served
AI-Powered
Healthcare
Intelligent Healthcare

AI-Powered Medical Assistance

Our advanced AI technology understands multiple Indian languages, identifies symptoms, and provides immediate guidance. Available 24/7, it bridges the gap between rural communities and quality healthcare with personalized recommendations.

Multilingual Support
24/7 Availability
Symptom Analysis
Digital Prescriptions

Our Solutions

Mobile-Based Access

Access healthcare services directly from your mobile phone using simple OTP authentication, making healthcare available to everyone with a basic phone.

AI-Powered Chatbot

Our multilingual AI chatbot guides patients through the process and provides recommendations based on symptoms in the language they're comfortable with.

Remote Consultations

Video conferencing allows patients to consult with specialists from their local kiosk or home, eliminating the need for long-distance travel.

Access to Specialists

Get referred to specialists and receive treatment plans through a simple and efficient process from the comfort of your village.

Digital Prescriptions

Receive and store digital prescriptions that can be accessed anytime and used at local pharmacies for easier medication access.

Emergency Services

Quick access to ambulance services during emergencies with live tracking and estimated arrival times for better emergency management.

Success Stories

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => (

"{testimonial.quote}"

{testimonial.author}
{testimonial.role}
))}
{testimonials.map((_, index) => ( goToTestimonial(index)} /> ))}
); } export default Home;
